lead_paragraph: With a little more playing time these past few days, Athletics slugger Billy Butler is finally getting comfortable at the plate — even in a rare appearance against a right-hander.

headline.print_headline: Butler Home Run in 8th Helps A's Beat Rays 3-2
headline.main: Butler Home Run in 8th Helps A's Beat Rays 3-2
